xbrli:xbrl.in-bse-fin:DescriptionOfOperatingExpense: Claims and benefits paid and other expenses pertaining to insurance business
Claims and benefits paid and other expenses pertaining to insurance business
xbrli:xbrl.in-bse-fin:DisclosureOfNotesOnSegmentsEx: Capital, Employees stock options outstanding, Reserves and Minority interest as on December 31, 2024 were Rs. 518148.15 crore. As the format does not have the particular category, it has been clubbed under Un-allocable Liabilities.
